name: v1_jokes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jokes_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Access a large collection of jokes from the internet. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/jokes.
API description: Fetches a set number of jokes from the API Ninjas Jokes API endpoint.

limit.description: The number of jokes to return, with a valid range of 1 to 30. Defaults to None, which returns a single joke.
